content: **meet the carter granny bag - your new bestie for work and wanderlust ** this isn t just another crochet catchall - it s a fresh funky tote that gives cool vintage vibes packed with personality it s perfect for coffee shop warriors and farmer s market pros stuff your laptop chargers and travel essentials in this roomy bag and let the sturdy handle hold up your haul rock this eye-catching tote and watch the compliments roll in pattern includes tutorial video **materials** -2 colors 2 skeins each of lion brand s made with love the cottony one sample made in pewter pan and flaming amber substitute any comparable worsted #4 weight yarn - cotton blends with be most effective -4 5mm crochet hooks -scissors -tapestry needle -tape measure -blocking supplies **techniques** -granny squares -working in the round -basic increasing -color changes -thermal stitch -motif assembly **measurements** one size - 16 at widest point 12 5 long 23 long strap // buy more save more // use these codes to save when you buy multiple patterns - saveon3 to save 10% off 3 patterns - saveon5 to save 15% off 5 patterns - saveon8 to save 20% off 8 patterns add all patterns to cart for discount limit one use per purchase
